title: New: Jr. Sea – Out of Body Auto-Reply
content:
Possibly the weirdest song title of the year, Jr.

Sea is a so far anonymous musician, simply referring to himself as J. R. C. Out of Body Auto-Reply is about as upbeat as you’re going to get, likely to draw comparisons to the likes of Local Natives, and Miike Snow, yet with a slightly more sinister edge to it, it’s been a while since I’ve heard a new artist that sounds as fully formed as Jr. Sea.. Produced by Tarek Musa (Chateaux, Jethro Fox), it’s one of the most ambitious debut tracks of the year. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
